name: Society (itch) (Akshay027)
description:
This game is bulit by one week . I named it society due to our current environment surrounded by people who are addicted to alcohol, smoking and using drugs . This game is just a message how to be safe ourself from them while the other people smoking and drinking.

I just made one level based on this concept for android . I have idea to built and make this as many different level which make people to be aware of this and upcoming childrens above 16 can play this game and be aware of this addictions and by not using this kind of stuff .

(Due to this game is made in a week i cant able to focus more on design part I have just given small design in 2d)

Instructions have been given in game .  

Hope you enjoy this prototype of my game and pls send me your reviews and comments.
